name: Parts Unknown
description:
Parts Unknown is a classic fighting game aiming to recapture the spirit of old fighting games with a unique style. It gives the player different fighting styles to master. If you loved games like Def Jam Vendetta, Street Fighter, Ready 2 Rumble Boxing , or Tekken, then you are sure to love this game.

Inspired by classic street fighting games like Def Jam Fight For NY, Parts Unknown combines stylish in depth fighting styles, beautiful music, and a story to keep you engaged through the game.

Parts Unknown is a third person story about an orphan who turns 18 and decides to fight for money to help with the upkeep of orphanages inspired by the great wrestler Nacho Libre.

The game in its current state features 1 open world, different fighting styles, and autosave. Future updates will have more open worlds and online multiplayer option available.
